title: Gary Whitta’s British Game Trivia! - Game Showdown
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Go to http://joinbilt.com/kindafunny to start earning points on your rent payments today.

We're joined by a guest host, Gary Whitta, to test our contestants on some real or fake British games!

Season 3, Episode 3.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:49 - First Question & Housekeeping
00:03:25 - Mad Categoriez
00:24:05 - Critical Hit
